Text: WOW .. u rock man .. ive been looking for this all over.. ANY criterion DVD-R is absolute gold.. If you have any more please do share them with us we d reallly be grateful!
Ohhh id love to get the other 2 parts of this trilogy i.e. The Blood of A Poet And Orpheus with English subs.. If you could manage that id be eternally grateful!

Dude.. thanks for this and all but how can anyone remove English subtitles from a French movie !!And u left JUST Bulgarian subtitles! how much space would it have taken if u just left the English subs! I hope u take note of this in ur future uploads or atleast list which subtitles are on the DVD-R so that we know before downloading. Thanks anyways for the effort!
